title: El Salvador's San Sebastian river has no fish -- a result of decades of gold mining nearby | National | bigcountrynewsconnection.com
text:
El Salvador's San Sebastian river has no fish -- a result of decades of gold mining nearby
- Marvin RECINOS
- Updated
Tags
As featured on
El Salvador's San Sebastian river has no fish. The runoff from a gold mine upstream, already shuttered two decades ago, has long killed them all.
